title.narrative: SSC on Cities (Water) in Ghana, phase I

description.narrative:
Strategic Sector Cooperation on Water in Cities Between Denmark and Ghana, Phase I
The Strategic Sector Cooperation on health is a peer-to-peer cooperation between the Aarhus Municipality and Municipality of Tema. The overall objective of the Strategic Sector Cooperation is to have a well-functioning and sustainable system for provision of sufficient and high quality water for its citizens and businesses in Tema as well as reduced environmental pollution due to improved collection and treatment of wastewater.Access to clean drinking water in and around Tema faces several institutional and external challenges such as: urbanization, growth rates, climate change, lack of sufficient finance for upfront investment and unsustainable revenue flows for operation and maintenance The project will address some of the main institutional challenges related to water management in Tema.
